::Ramulus::

Ramulus picks up on of the weapons that the replicator machine was spitting 
out at him. It looked like a pistol (the weapon, not the replicator machine), 
with a small atatchment on top. The main area fired a beam, containing a 
modified cyber-virus to destroy the mind-controlling chip. The atatchment, 
which could be mistaken for a scope, held five chips, each identical to the 
one that Ramulus now had in his head, designed to prevent the mind-control.

Snatching about a dozen guns, Ramulus puts them in various compartments in 
his body, and, holding two of them, runs out of the lab, speeding toward the 
exit of the CF.
